dcterms:description: The ASVspoof2019 dataset is used for evaluating anti-spoofing systems, providing a controlled environment for testing various spoofing methods.
dcterms:title: ASVspoof2019 dataset

dcterms:description: The ASVspoof2019 simulated PA dataset is an improved version with controlled environments and acoustic configurations for testing replay attack detection.
dcterms:title: ASVspoof2019 simulated PA dataset

dcterms:description: The Real-PA dataset consists of real replay operations from different labs, used to evaluate the performance of anti-spoofing systems.
dcterms:title: Real-PA dataset
